title: Catherine Flowers, "Waste: One Woman’s Fight Against America’s Dirty Secret"
description:
Catherine Flowers, founder of the Center for Rural Enterprise and Environmental Justice, reflects on her efforts to improve water and sanitation conditions in rural areas across America. She’s interviewed by Grist senior editor Nikhil Swaminathan.
